findings.liver: Hepatic parenchyma within normal limits, smooth contour. An echogenic, round focus in the left hepatic lobe without demonstrable vascularity could be a hemangioma or focal fat.
findings.bile_ducts: Mild intrahepatic biliary dilation; CBD dilated at 8 mm with several obstructing common bile duct stones, largest measuring up to 1.3 cm.
findings.gallbladder: Markedly distended with numerous gallstones; gallbladder wall measures up to 3 mm.
findings.pancreas: Within normal limits, no masses or ductal dilation.
findings.kidneys: Right kidney measures 9.5 cm, left kidney 9.7 cm; no hydronephrosis.
